verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H2583>encamp<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> by his own <S%H1714>standard,<s%> with the <S%H226>banners<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses:<s%> at a <S%H5048>distance<s%> from the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> shall they <S%H2583>encamp<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>"

Those who <S%H2583>encamp<s%> on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrise<s%> shall be of the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>divisions:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H7657>them,<s%> were seventy-four <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Those who <S%H2583>encamp<s%> next to him shall be the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> shall be <S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H2572>it,<s%> were fifty - <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
The <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> shall be <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H2572>it,<s%> were fifty - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

All who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> - <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>divisions.<s%> They shall set <S%H5265>out<s%> <S%H7223>first.<s%>

"On the south <S%H8486>side<s%> shall be the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H6635>divisions.<s%> The <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> shall be <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H705>it,<s%> were forty - <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

"Those who <S%H2583>encamp<s%> next to him shall be the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon.<s%> The <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> shall be <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H2572>them,<s%> were fifty - <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
"The <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> shall be <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H705>them,<s%> were forty - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

"All who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> were <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> They shall set <S%H5265>out<s%> <S%H8145>second.<s%>

"Then the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting<s%> shall set <S%H5265>out,<s%> with the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>camps.<s%> As they <S%H2583>encamp,<s%> so shall they set <S%H5265>out,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H3027>place,<s%> by their <S%H1714>standards.<s%>

"On the west <S%H3220>side<s%> shall be the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H6635>divisions:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall be <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H705>them,<s%> were forty <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

"Next to him shall be the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> shall be <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H7970>them,<s%> were thirty - two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

"The <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall be <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni.<s%>
His <S%H6635>army,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H7970>them,<s%> were thirty - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thirty-five<s%> thousand <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

"All who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> according to their <S%H6635>divisions.<s%> They shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out <S%H7992>third.<s%>

"On the north <S%H6828>side<s%> shall be the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> according to their <S%H6635>divisions:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> shall be <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H8346>them,<s%> were sixty - <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

"Those who <S%H2583>encamp<s%> next to him shall be the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> shall be <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ochran.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H705>them,<s%> were forty - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

"The <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali:<s%> and the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> shall be <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan.<s%>
His <S%H6635>division,<s%> and those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H2572>them,<s%> were fifty - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

"All who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> were one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%> They shall <S%H5265>set<s%> out <S%H314>last<s%> by their <S%H1714>standards.<s%>"

These are those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%> All who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4264>camps<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>
But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

Thus the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%> According to all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> by their <S%H1714>standards,<s%> and so they set <S%H5265>out,<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
